HackyHour@Auckland

HackyHour@Auckland
Research - Tools - Code - Sharing
3-4pm @ Strata Cafe every Thursday Join us on Slack!

About

Hacky Hour is a shared space and place where students and researchers can congregate to work on their research problems related to code, data, or digital tools in a social environment.

Inspired by #ResBaz and initiatives at Melbourne Uni we are building a community @ UoA to share skills and knowledge across disciplinary boundaries.

When and Where

Hacky Hour is an open and inclusive environment, all are welcome to join in. With support from the Centre for eResearch there are knowledgeable folk around who can help you with your research or technical questions.

Join us from 3-4pm @ Strata Cafe every Thursday. Bring along your research questions, latest tools to share, or things to hack on - along with your device if you have one - and we look forward to seeing you there!
